name: Winds of Berkana
description:
Mankind is gone. The only remains of its existence are the once great bastions, now empty and in ruins. The only surviving boy and his mother live isolated in a small lake, inside a quiet valley. Once his mother dies, she leaves him a clue that mankind still survives in an enchanted city. Eden. This triggers the boy to take his ship and explore the luxurious world, in search of Eden.

The game will follow the main narrative in a mostly linear progression. The player will move through the game using a flying boat. It will use air currents to travel in-between bastions, which are structures of the old world. Arriving in each bastion, the character will anchor the boat and step on land. Here the game will assume a standard 3rd person-view control of the character with jump, run, walk usual movement. At the end of each bastion, the story will progress.

This game is still in development.
